lines.text: Do you think Mom's dress is beautiful?
Beautiful like Mom.
The countryside is beautiful.
The smell of the trees, the grass or the river.
Imagine a wedding in a mausoleum.
You're silly.
00 show. I'd love it.
If it's a Western, fine.
No horses in this one.
A French film, then.
Yes, with Brigitte Bardot and Jeanne Moreau for the first time together. Which one do you prefer? Which woman?
Which woman? You.
Does you wife make honey?
You could say that. She's nice and cooks well.

[to Thérèse, his wife]
If you're mad, I'll spank you.
I love you too. I feel happy. Be happy too, don't worry. I'm free, happy, and you're not the first. Love me.
Such happiness!
Are you happy at home too?
Very happy.
Your wife is not a habit?
No. I love her very much. We get along, we have fun. And there are the kids. Surprises every day.
And me?
I met you and I love you.
Were you sad?
Not that much. I don't like sadness.
Now I'm here. I'm myself, I mean.
I like that about you. And it's the same for me. I can't say I'm different since I met you. On the contrary, I'm even more myself.
You know, I met my wife when I was in the service. It was love at first sight. We married when I got out. Had I met you first, I'd live with you.
Sleeping together is fine when you're in love.
Tell me one thing - are she and I the same to you?

No, very different. You make love better, you have fun. It's like a new wine for me. My head is spinning and your pleasure is in my heart. Like with Thérèse. She likes making love too - but she's calmer. I'm the one who leads the game. She likes me to have fun with her. She's tender - always there - and our kids look like her. You see, I'm being honest.
Yes.
You taught me another game, we're more alike. Thérèse is like a hardy plant. You're like an animal set free. I love nature.
You and I and the kids, we're like an apple orchard, a square field. Then I notice an apple tree that grows outside the field and blooms with us. More flowers, more apples. It adds up, you know.
How long have I not been alone with you?
I love you. Look at me. I love you. It's like if I had ten arms to hug you and you had ten arms for me. We're all mixed together. But I found myself with extra arms. I'm taking nothing from you, see?
